criteria.description: Date of contract formation is included.
The parties involved (beneficiaries) are clearly identified.
The object of the contract (e.g., mandate, payment, property) is specified.
The obligations of the parties (e.g., payment, transfer of ownership) are detailed.
The date of conclusion is included, where relevant.
Terms of the offer are clearly defined and final within the document.
Reciprocal obligations (synallagmatic) demonstrating a serious and definitive intention to contract are established.
The offer complies with the form requirements appropriate to the type of contract being formed. Check national provisions governing the specific contract type for mandatory form requirements.
